author: ChrisMisan
body:
#### PR description:
Goal of this PR is to fix the unaligned address operations in TotemSampicFrame(please refer to #35012). It is replacing pointer casts with sequence of bitwise operations which don't violate byte alignment of the data array.

#### PR validation:
Changes were validated against relval 136.8562, new values were compared with the previous implementation. There was no difference in the produced numbers.

@jan-kaspar
title: Fix reading from unaligned address in TotemSampicFrame
